uk.co.strangeskies.reflection

Interface Scope

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InstanceScope<I>, StaticScope
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InstanceScopeImpl, ScopeImpl, StaticScopeImpl

    public interface Scope
    Represents a compile-time scope for evaluation of java expressions. A scope defines which local variables are available, as well as the enclosing type of the expression (i.e. the type of the "this" reference).

    Available local variables may conceptually include method parameters of any enclosing methods or lambdas.

      default boolean isScopeVisible(Scope scope)
